problems.title: Diet Plan Performance (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Calculate the total points a dieter has based on calorie consumption over consecutive sequences of k days.

Input Format:
First line: four integers n, k, lower, and upper.
Second line: n space-separated integers (calories).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the total points.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
